name: Requirements Gathering
description: Understanding and documenting what the software must achieve is critical to project success.
how_to: Use requirement management tools or documents
Review and get sign-off from stakeholders

name: Design
description: A well-thought-out design ensures the system architecture supports requirements and is maintainable.
tasks: Plan for scalability, security, and performance
how_to: Use UML or other modeling tools
Collaborate with architects and senior developers
Review design documents with the team

name: Implementation
description: Actual coding transforms designs into working software.
how_to: Follow coding standards and best practices

name: Code Review
description: Ensures code quality, consistency, and knowledge sharing.
tasks: Review code for correctness and style
how_to: Use code review tools (e.g., GitHub PRs)

name: Testing
description: Validates that the software meets requirements and is free of critical defects.
tasks: Perform functional, regression, and performance testing
how_to: Use automated and manual testing techniques

name: Deployment
description: Delivering the software to production or end-users is essential for value realization.
tasks: Execute deployment in staging and production
Monitor deployment success and rollback if needed

name: Maintenance
description: Ongoing support and improvements ensure software longevity and user satisfaction.
